successes.title: Prynt: the first instant camera case for iPhone and Android
successes.description: Plug in your phone, snap a picture, and get a printed photo in seconds. Then watch your photos come to life through augmented reality!

Pledges.description: PRYNT FAN: Your donation helps get us started, thank you so much!  Your name will be featured in the "Hall Of Framed" section on website, and we will make sure to keep you up to date with exclusive details and news as we make progress on Prynt's first product!

PRYNT STYLE: Thank you loyal supporter! You can show the world you backed our project with a custom designed T-shirt from Team Prynt! Your name will also be included in our “Hall of Framed" supporters, and you’ll be in the know with all our future news and updates.

PRYNT SUPER EARLY BIRD: You are the earliest bird! And as a thank you, get 1 Prynt case + a pack of 10 sheets of paper. Early birds get early shipping, too — Prynt comes to you before anyone else. And you'll be featured in the "Hall of Framed" section on our website.
Want more paper? For every $25 you add to your pledge, we'll send you 50 extra sheets.

PRYNT EARLY BIRD: Congrats early bird, you're one of our very first backers! For being one of the first, you get 1 Prynt Case + a pack of 10 sheets of paper. 
Early birds get early shipping, too — Prynt comes to you before anyone else. And you'll be featured in the "Hall of Framed" section on our website.
Want more paper? For every $25 you add to your pledge, we'll send you 50 extra sheets.

PRYNT CLASSIC (1st shipment): Congrats, you are now the owner of your very own Prynt case + a pack of 10 sheets of paper + you get featured on the "Hall of Framed" section on our website. Plus, you'll be among the first to get Prynt along with our early birds!
Want more paper? For every $25 you add to your pledge, we'll send you 50 extra sheets.
PRYNT CLASSIC (2nd shipment): Congrats, you are now the owner of your very own Prynt case + a pack of 10 sheets of paper + you get featured on the "Hall of Framed" section on our website.
Want more paper? For every $25 you add to your pledge, we'll send you 50 extra sheets.

PRYNT FLARE: Congrats, you'll own the Prynt case + a pack of 10 sheets of paper + a "Hall of Framed" mention. We'll also send you our custom designed Prynt t-shirt so you look super fly out and about.
Want more paper? For every $25 you add to your pledge, we'll send you 50 extra sheets.

PRYNT ADDICT: Congrats, you'll own the Prynt case + a pack of 30 sheets of paper + a "Hall of Framed" mention. We'll also send you our custom designed Prynt t-shirt and a special photo album to store those memories.
